It may have something to do with a case at the Bureau.
I would rather not talk on the phone or online.
It will be quicker for you to see it for yourself, so I am attaching a map to the location.
I will be waiting

I have something important to talk to you about.
It may have something to do with a case at the Bureau.
I would rather not talk on the phone or online.
It will be quicker for you to see it for yourself, so I am attaching a map to the location.
I will be waiting for you there at 3 PM tomorrow.

I will be waiting for you there at 3 PM tomorrow.
My head is full of things
My head is full of things
that I can never tell anybody of
that I can never tell anybody of
In this perfect world
In this perfect world
I roam, a lost being
I roam, a lost being
This world is impossibly hard on me
This world is impossibly hard on me
It is an illusion that plays out before my eyes
It is an illusion that plays out before my eyes
Can I find its faults?
Can I find its faults?
Plastic, all is plastic

You are made of plastic too, like this beautiful world
You are made of plastic too, like this beautiful world

there is something
there is something
that obscures all light for me
that obscures all light for me

10: Methuselah's Game
Yes.
That email was the last I heard from her.
Kaori says she has not been able to reach her since yesterday either.
Yes...
Yeah, sure.
I will contact you right away if anything comes up.
Well then...
So she did not go back to her parents' place either?
Seems not.
Any chance she could be playing some kind of prank?
She jokes around sometimes, but she would not do something like this.
Well, I guess actually going there to check it out is our best shot.
Sorry to drag you along with me on your day off.
That is okay.
Am I mixing personal and official business?
It will be all right as long as Gino does not find out.
Does this friend of yours often visit places like this?
No way.
It is a little strange, is not it?
More than a little.
This has to be a trap.
You are being targeted.
I am?
By who?
Do you recall doing anything to make any enemies?
No way!
Hey, you do realize you are a detective, do not you?
You are giving me that too?!
Anyway, I will go check it out.
Just stay there and wait for me.
But if this is really a trap, you will be in danger.
That is why I want you to stay put.
If we both get taken out, who is going to call for help?
Should not we call for backup right away?
If you feel it is necessary, do it.
Also, give me permission to carry arms.
Ah...
Okay.
This is Tsunemori Akane.
By my authority as an Inspector, I request permission for an Enforcer to carry arms.
Voiceprint and ID confirmed.
Level 2 equipment usage is granted.
I will leave the navigation to you.
You have got the location map, right?
Yes.
The data is old, but it is still usable.
Do you see anyone there?
No.
In the back...
Yeah?
In the back, it is just a dead end.
Kougami...
Kougami?
What?
Wait...
What is this?
Hey...
What is going on?
Hey, Inspector, what happened?
Come in.
Reading you loud and clear.
Please keep going.
What the heck is this?
It is an abandoned subway line.
Please check the train cars.
Kougami!
Can you hear me?!
Come in!
Hey, Inspector!
What is going on?!
It is an abandoned subway line.
Please check the train cars.
Do not worry.
I am a detective with the Public Safety Bureau.
Oh...
Who are you?
I am Funahara Yuki.
Are you a friend of Tsunemori Akane?
You know Akane?!
I am one of her colleagues.
This is not good.
The basement is submerged.
From the smell, it is got to be polluted water mixed with liquid waste.
If something like that gets poured on you, you will be in for a world of hurt.
But Kougami definitely kept going past that point.
In fact, he went back even further, seemingly through the wall!
Is not that a problem with the navigator?
The issue might not be with the hardware, but rather with the software.
Since this area has been repeatedly redeveloped,
you would never know if the map data available matches the actual layout.
Are not you the one who got deceived here,
Inspector Tsunemori?
What?
Kougami left your supervision and now his whereabouts are unknown.
In other words...
This whole situation might have been a setup for him to escape.
Er... missy...
Suppose we trust the navigator instead of the map data.
Do you know which direction Kougami was headed?
Did the signal show any strange movements?
Come to think of it...
After a while, he suddenly started moving in a straight line, really fast.
Oh, I see!
He must have ended up in some kind of vehicle.
Is not there a subway line around here that runs in a north-south direction?
Hold on a sec.
Looks like there is.
The subway Ginza Line.
But it was shut down sixty years ago.
Then you were not the one who sent Tsunemori Akane that email?
I do not know anything about that!
What is going on?
What am I doing here?!
Someone captured you and brought you here.
You do not remember anything?
I do not know.
I got home late from work, so I took a bath and went straight to bed.
When I woke up, I was already here.
What is going on?
It seems you were used as bait to lure Inspector Tsunemori.
Or rather...
It is an abandoned subway line.
Akane's voice?!
It is well made, but it is a fake created from voice samples.
They knew all along that she would not be the one to come to the basement, but someone else instead.
Their target is not Tsunemori.
Are they after me?
Did it stop?
I guess this means they want us to get off.
Where are we?
I do not know.
They are jamming all communications.
Seems like they want to isolate us at all costs.
They want us to go in here?
Having to dance to this guy's tune kind of pisses me off, but...
It does not look like we have much choice.
Follow me!
What is this place?
Everything has gone to plan so far.
It seems they are quick on the uptake too.
The smarter the prey, the more enjoyable the hunt becomes.
That is good.
Looks like it will be a worthwhile game to watch from the bleachers.
Why do not you take part in the hunt for a change?
My interest lies in what will transpire during this hunt.
So it would be best for me to observe things as a third party.
What are those?
Chemical lights.
Would not the flashlight be better?
If you carry a light source in the dark, you might as well paint a target on yourself.
We can also use these to mark where we have been.
So Akane's job is really that dangerous?
It is been especially bad lately.
I should have taken her concerns more seriously.
Well, she does work at the Bureau.
She cannot discuss the details of her work with civilians.
Is she doing okay at work?
She has...
She intuitively understands what it means to be a detective.
I think what this society really needs is more people like her.
She was different even when we were in school.
No matter what the trouble was, once she intervened, it got resolved.
I wonder if those with the clearest Psycho-Pass Hues are always people like her.
Oh, could you be that subordinate that she does not know what to do with?
So that is how she talks about me?
What is the matter?
It is a trap.
Even their traps are old-fashioned.
They have certainly got interesting tastes.
Ah... wait.
A little to the right of the floor you just checked...
That is the same bag we saw earlier!
Do not!
Yeah.
Now I know what this is all about.
They want to entertain themselves with some fox hunting.
H-Hunting?
Those drones are hunting dogs.
When the prey gets frightened and runs, the hunter finishes it off.
That leaves us as the poor foxes.
O-Oh no...
Do not panic.
Do not get scared.
Calm down and look for a way out.
The more we panic, the more we play right into their hands.
Where is the bag you picked up earlier?
This one?
What is that?
It is a portable transponder.
We can communicate with this, even through their signal interference.
W-We can call for help?!
Unfortunately, it is missing the battery and antenna.
I will distract them.
You keep hiding here.
What are you going to do?
We have no chance with two hunting dogs.
I need to bring at least one of them down,
or they will surround us, and that will be the end of it.
Oh?
Mr. Kougami!
Run!
I killed one of them.
And...
All I need now is the antenna.
He sure is something else.
He might be a fox, but even foxes have sharp teeth.
Or maybe he is really a member of the wolf family.
Makishima...
Did you add some plot of your own to this game without my knowledge?
When a man faces fear, his soul is tested.
What he was born to seek, and what he was born to achieve...
His true nature will become clear.
Are you making fun of me?
It is not just that Kougami guy.
I am interested in you too, Mr. Senguji.
You will face an unforeseen situation.
An unexpected turn of events.
And in the wake of those, you too will face your true self.
I know that is the thrill and excitement you have been seeking.
Indeed.
Well, I must say I do not really mind that habit you have of looking down on others.
Now, Kougami Shinya...
Will you understand the meaning of this game?
I cannot... run anymore.
I cannot!
I cannot do it!
Hey, are you listening?
Sorry.
I was thinking about something.
Just say something.
You are scary when you are quiet.
I was thinking...
They lured in Tsunemori, using you as bait,
but they knew it was actually me who would go look for you instead.
They factored all that in when setting up this hunt.
It is you who they want to play with, right?
I am just...
Dammit!
I am just someone who got dragged into this, right?!
That is right.
Your role in this should have been over after that email was sent at the beginning.
So why did they put you on the subway?
Maybe it was to make it harder for you to run away?
In fact, I am holding you back like this now.
If I was not here, you would find it much easier to escape, right?
It is fine.
Do what you want to do.
This is terrible...
This fox hunt...
is not just a one-sided game.
They are hinting that I have got a chance, too.
In other words, I am being tested.
I will bet that whether I abandon you or not
is also one of the keys to winning this game.
Hey, take off your clothes!
Huh?!
Wh-What are you thinking about?
Here, of all places!
Just give them to me.
Are you insane?!
Have you totally lost it or what?!
If you want to survive, just do what I say!
I cannot believe a perv like you is with the Bureau!
Wh-Whaddaya think you are looking at?!
Do not you usually wear matching underwear?
That is...
What?
How did this...
Give me your underwear too.
L-Look the other way!
I see.
The last item needed to beat the game was hidden on you.
Here is the antenna for the transponder.
There is some pretty heavy interference in this area, though the range is limited.
Where is the source of the interference?
It is coming from the southwest.
But based on the map, there should not be anything in that area.
Okay then.
We will set up a relay base here.
Do not trust the map data.
Check every single gap thoroughly.
Also, the moment you see Kougami, shoot him with the Dominator.
There will be time for questions later.
But we still do not know for sure if he ran away!
The Sibyl System will make that decision.
If he did not do anything wrong, his Crime Coefficient will be the same as before,
and the gun's Paralyzer mode will settle it.
If he really wanted to run, the Eliminator mode will wipe him out without mercy, right?
You cannot fool the cymatic scan.
It will show Kougami's real intentions.
Are you saying that it is okay to just kill him?!
You used to be his friend, right?!
If he ends up dying,
Inspector Tsunemori, it will be because of you and your poor supervision.
If you would kept Kougami under control, none of this would have happened.
How do you feel about someone dying as a result of your own incompetence?
Hey, Inspector...
How about you stop right there?
That was a little too harsh.
It is from Kougami!
You can detect my location, right?
We have got a Code 108 currently in progress.
Send in reinforcements immediately.
I repeat.
A Code 108 is currently in progress.
Send in reinforcements immediately.
Send all the Drones we have got!
But we do not know what path to take.
Have them strike out randomly!
Make sure at least one Drone reaches him!
Kougami...
Let us make it in time!
It seems all fairy tales are dead
It seems all fairy tales are dead
In a hospital ward of brick stones
my voice is too coarse to sing
Outside in the foggy haze
a red moon glows
Look at me
Do not avert your gaze
Behind black bars
I was born
I wish there were a punishment for evil
Always I need you
Now, grant us justice
before chaos takes us all
Pay the price of fate and let us go together,
nameless beasts
This is a world where the mental state and personal tendencies of humans can be quantified.
While all sorts of inclinations are recorded and policed, these measured numbers used to judge people's souls are commonly called Psycho-Pass.
This is a world where the mental state and personal tendencies of humans can be quantified.
While all sorts of inclinations are recorded and policed, these measured numbers used to judge people's souls are commonly called Psycho-Pass.
This story is a work of fiction.
The names of all individuals and organizations that appear in this show are fictitious and any similarity to those in existence in the real world is purely coincidental.
